programme.title: Opening Ceremony | Beijing 2008 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Remember the greatest moments from the Opening Ceremony of the Beijing Summer Olympic Games in 2008 and watch it once more

programme.title: Opening Ceremony | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 04/02/2022 at the National Stadium

programme.title: VIVA - The Opening Ceremony Documentary of Rio 2016
programme.desc: For the first time ever, experience the work of a nation as it hosts the world and puts on a show like never before.

programme.title: Athens 2004 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The opening ceremony was held on August 13, 2004 at the Olympic Stadium in Maroussi, Greece.

programme.title: Closing Ceremony | Rio 2016 Replays
programme.desc: Watch again all the magic of the Rio 2016 Closing Ceremony.

programme.title: Closing Ceremony | PyeongChang 2018 Replays
programme.desc: The 2018 Winter Olympics closing ceremony was held at the Pyeongchang Olympic Stadium on 25 February 2018.

programme.title: Salt Lake 2002 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony took place at the Rice-Eccles Olympic Stadium in Salt Lake City on 8 February 2002.

programme.title: Torino 2006 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: Relive the closing ceremony held at the Stadio Olimpico in Turin on February 26th, 2006.

programme.title: Beijing 2008 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony was held at the Bird's Nest and was directed by Chinese filmmaker Zhang Yimou.

programme.title: Vancouver 2010 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: The Closing Ceremony of the 2010 Winter Olympics took place on February 28, 2010, at the BC Place Stadium in Vancouver.

programme.title: Closing Ceremony | London 2012 Replays
programme.desc: The ceremony was held on 12–13 August in the Olympic Stadium. It's also known as A Symphony of British Music.

programme.desc: Bryony Page had to overcome an extraordinary mental obstacle on her way to becoming Team GB’s first ever Olympic trampoline medallist.

programme.desc: The thrilling Olympic gold medal final featured fire on the ice, against historic adversaries Russia and the Czech Republic.
